actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Rehabilitation Act of 1973 to establish the National Office of the Handicapped, and for other purposes.
short_title: National Office of the Handicapped Act
subjects: Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: National Office of the Handicapped Act - Title I: National Office of the Handicapped - Establishes in the Office of Education the National Office of the Handicapped. Consolidates in such Office specified programs and functions of various Federal agencies dealing with the handicapped. Sets forth the organization of such Office. Title II: Federal Council on Handicapped Individuals - Establishes a Federal Council on Handicapped Individuals to provide advice and assistance to the President concerning the problems and needs of handicapped and severely handicapped individuals.

titles.title: National Office of the Handicapped Act
A bill to amend the Rehabilitation Act of 1973 to establish the National Office of the Handicapped, and for other purposes.
